name: Sleet Hiker
description:
A platformer about climbing and exploring with martial arts and fireballs!

Obviously inspired by Celeste.

Made in Godot Engine. Music and sprites are self-made. Font is Rainy Hearts by Camellina.

Also on Newgrounds!

FIX 1 (November 11, 2022)

  • Changed unlockable wall sprite to prevent confusion.
